text: Glenn Gilbertti (born November 12, 1968 in Brooklyn, New York) is an American professional wrestler who was best known for wrestling with World Championship Wrestling (WCW) and Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) under the ring name, Disco Inferno. He currently works as a host at the Sapphire Gentlemen's Club, which is a strip club in Las Vegas, Nevada. ==Championships and awards== Gilbertti won many championships during his professional wrestling career: *Great Championship Wrestling **GCW Heavyweight Championship (one time) **GCW Tag Team Championship (one time) with Johnny Swinger **GCW Television Championship (three times) **GCW United States Junior Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Impact Pro Wrestling (New Zealand) **Armageddon Cup in 2008 *Mid- Eastern Wrestling Federation **MEWF Heavyweight Championship (one time) *North Georgia Wrestling Association **NGWA Tag Championship (one time) (with Ashley Clark) *Palmetto Pride Championship Wrestling **PPCW Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Swiss Wrestling Federation **SWF Heavyweight Championship (one time) *World Championship Wrestling **WCW Cruiserweight Championship (one time) **WCW World Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Alex Wright) **WCW World Television Championship (two times) *Wrestling Observer Newsletter awards **Best Gimmick in 1995 ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: Disco Inferno (wrestler)
